title: guruparan tiruvaruLE
sahitya:
guruparan tiruvaruLE arum marundAgumE kuvalayam idilun kavalai vilaga manamE


anupallavi

  aruNOdayam Anadum aghanrODi maraiyum iruLinaip-pOla un iDarini viraindODa


caraNam    tunbangaL aDuttut-tollaippaDuttinAl tuyarangaL maDuttu ayarvadai viDuttu
inbattaik-koDukkavum innalait-taDukkavum inrum enrumE iNaiyaTra tuNaiyAgum
